name: Mamba (miccaido)
description:
Story

During hard times on unemployment, Mamba's father went to an illegal mine to look for ways to provide for his small family and never came back. After missing for a couple of weeks, his son Mamba vouched to personally look for his father at the hazardous mine without any experience.

will he survive ? Join Mamba as he looks for his father.

How To Play

use your mouse,

point and click

if you like the game please donate so we can keep making these games. will appreciate it and grow ourselves here in africa.
